definition: having bones especially many or prominent bones
details:
adjective
- having bones especially many or prominent bones
= example: having bones especially many or prominent bones
= synonyms: boney
- very thin especially from disease or hunger or cold
= example: very thin especially from disease or hunger or cold
= synonyms: wasted, cadaverous, emaciated, gaunt, haggard, pinched, skeletal
- composed of or containing bone
= synonyms: osseous
